summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1314, for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from East Fifty-second Street to a point two hundred fifty (250) feet north of the north margin of East Fifty-second Street, by constructing a sewer of proper dimensions and material, together with all wyes, etc., under Ordinance No. 14960, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
